title: Global lemon and lime production 2000 to 2017
summary: Overall Production in million metric tons has increased over the Year.
Production in million metric tons is roughly constant from 2010 to 2013, and lastly slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Production in million metric tons, of value 16.25 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Production in million metric tons, of value 14.85 was reported at Year 2010
min_summary: In general Production in million metric tons has rose over the Year.
Production in million metric tons is roughly constant from 2010 to 2013, and lastly slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014.
